content.raw:
The markers plot still has slight alignment issues (the marker lines in the top widget are showing up slightly offset from the lines in the plots), however the basic functionality appears to be complete.
I think in the interest of making progress on other issues such as nonlinear time, we should merge this now and fix the minor cosmetic issues in a later pull request.
content.html: The markers plot still has slight alignment issues (the marker lines in the top widget are showing up slightly offset from the lines in the plots), however the basic functionality appears to be complete. I think in the interest of making progress on other issues such as nonlinear time, we should merge this now and fix the minor cosmetic issues in a later pull request.
